title: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
body:
When i start to open LoL, It like 5 minutes and then it comes up with this message. I tried to redownload LoL, but i cant even do that. 
Plz fix Rito

replies.body:
It's a problem that's been overlooked by Riot, and it's related to their new patcher.

One solution people have found to be working for them is to swap out their default DNS and to use Google's one, [instructions here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4).

Another is to reset their Internet Explorer settings, and then setting the security level to "Low" and to let the program run in Admin mode.

Last, [this random tip](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/299357) from googly4646.

Best of luck.
